txt_en: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
txt_cn: 你不主宰时光，时光就会主宰你。
author: Jim Rohn

txt_en: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
txt_cn: 我们可能会遭遇许多失败，但绝不能被它们击败。
author: Maya Angelou

txt_en: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
txt_cn: 我相信每个人的心跳次数有限，所以我不想浪费任何一下。
author: Neil Armstrong

txt_en: Problems are guidelines, not stop signs!
txt_cn: 问题不是止步的信号，而是前进的指引。
author: Robert H. Schuller

txt_en: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
txt_cn: 对身体最好的治疗就是让头脑安静。
author: Napoléon

txt_en: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
txt_cn: 想要成就一番事业，不仅要行动，还要敢于梦想；不仅要做计划，还要抱有信念。
author: Anatole France

txt_en: Be not simply good — be good for something.
txt_cn: 不要一味地善良，要有原则地善良。
author: Thoreau

txt_en: Don't bother just to be better than others. Try to be better than yourself.
txt_cn: 不要为了比别人强而烦恼，要努力比自己强。
author: William Faulkner

txt_en: Curiosity is the lust of the mind.
txt_cn: 好奇心是大脑的渴望。
author: Thomas Hobbes

txt_en: Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.
txt_cn: 能者达人所不达，智者达人所未见。
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

txt_en: Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible.
txt_cn: 不偏离常规，就无法取得进步。
author: Frank Zappa

txt_en: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
txt_cn: 要想成功，态度同能力一样重要。
author: Sir Walter Scott

txt_en: Tomorrow belongs to those who can hear it coming.
txt_cn: 明天属于那些能听见它来临的人。
author: David Bowie

txt_en: In every person who comes near you look for what is good and strong.
txt_cn: 对于你遇见的每一个人，要寻找他的优点和强项。
author: John Ruskin

txt_en: We are all different. Don't judge, understand instead.
txt_cn: 每个人都不同。别去评断别人，要去理解别人。
author: Roy T. Bennett

txt_en: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
txt_cn: 你注定只会成为你决心要变成的那个人。
author: Emerson

txt_en: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
txt_cn: 已经完成的小事，胜于计划中的大事。
author: Peter Marshall

txt_en: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
txt_cn: 生活就是实验，实验的次数越多你就做得越好。
author: Emerson

txt_en: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.
txt_cn: 将一切奉献给当下，就是对未来的真正慷慨。
author: Albert Camus

txt_en: Love ceases to be a pleasure when it ceases to be a secret.
txt_cn: 爱情一旦不神秘了，也就失去了它的乐趣。
author: Aphra Behn

txt_en: Children are not things to be molded, but are people to be unfolded.
txt_cn: 孩子不是有待铸造的物料，而是有待启发的人。
author: Jess Lair
